publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4999.1 Derek Brownlee: Young People and Familiesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4999) in the name of Patrick Harvie, leave out from first "regrets" to end and insert "believes that the most important duties of the Executive towards young people are to provide them with better opportunities for education and employment, a safe environment with affordable housing in which to live and public services which are efficient and effective, and calls for a greater focus from the Executive on delivering improvements in public services and providing opportunities for young people, families, and everyone else in Scotland."
